targets.query:
from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "numbackends" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "maxwritten_clean" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "deadlocks" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["com.docker.stack.namespace"] == "fm")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cpu"] == "cpu-total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["com.docker.swarm.service.name"] == "fm_postgresql")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "datname" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "datid" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "conflicts" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "docker_container_mem")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "usage")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["com.docker.swarm.service.name"] == "fm_postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["com.docker.stack.namespace"] == "fm")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "xact_commit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "xact_commit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> increase()
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "xact_rollback")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "xact_rollback")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> increase()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "blk_read_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "blk_write_time")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "blks_hit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "blks_read")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "blks_hit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> increase()
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "blks_read")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> increase()
  |> derivative()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "blks_hit")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "blks_read")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tup_deleted" or r["_field"] == "tup_fetched" or r["_field"] == "tup_inserted" or r["_field"] == "tup_returned" or r["_field"] == "tup_updated")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "buffers_alloc" or r["_field"] == "buffers_backend" or r["_field"] == "buffers_backend_fsync" or r["_field"] == "buffers_clean" or r["_field"] == "buffers_checkpoint")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "checkpoint_sync_time" or r["_field"] == "checkpoint_write_time" or r["_field"] == "checkpoints_timed")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "frinx")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "postgresql")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "checkpoints_req")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["db"] == "${database}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")
